name: Thanks Obama!
description:
Inspired by the vaporwave a e s t h e t i c, Thanks Obama is a game where you pick up the good and avoid the bad. Thank him, blame him, have fun.

game by marlise

update v0.1

  • fixed buttons and UI bugs for different screen sizes
  • added high score
  • added quit button

This was a two week project that had the prompt of - memes. The concept behind the project was to create a game that had flashy aesthetics and was not political.
